N = int(input())
V = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
V.sort()
while len(V) > 1:
    a = V.pop(0)
    b = V.pop(0)
    V.append((a + b)//2)
    V.sort()
print(V[0])

def main():
    N = int(input())
    V = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    V.sort()
    while len(V) > 1:
        a = V.pop(0)
        b = V.pop(0)
        V.append((a + b) / 2)
        V.sort()
    print(V[0])

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

from heapq import heappush, heappop
import sys

N = int(sys.stdin.readline())
heap = []
for _ in range(N):
    num = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    heappush(heap, num)

while len(heap) > 1:
    a = heappop(heap)
    b = heappop(heap)
    heappush(heap, (a + b) / 2)

print(heap[0])

import sys

def main():
    n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    nums = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    nums.sort()
    while len(nums) > 1:
        nums = nums[:-2] + [float((nums[-1] + nums[-2]) / 2)]
        nums.sort()
    print(nums[0])

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
